name: Coal Ore
description: A piece of ore commonly found underground.

name: Copper Ore
description: A basic metal, often used for tools and wiring.

name: Iron Ore
description: A sturdy ore, essential for durable equipment.

name: Topaz
description: A shiny gem with a warm glow.

name: Emerald
description: A rare green gem, prized for its clarity and brilliance.

name: Ruby
description: A vibrant red gemstone, symbol of wealth and power.

name: Diamond
description: A rare and precious gem, dazzling with brilliance.

name: Obsidian
description: A mysterious volcanic glass, dark and sharp.

name: Mythril Ore
description: A legendary metal, light yet impossibly strong.

name: Rusty Pick Axe
description: Barely holds together. Better than nothing.

name: Banana Axe
description: A slippery axe made from a banana. Not very reliable.

name: Worn Iron Pickaxe
description: Sturdy enough to mine reliably, though worn.

name: Robust Pickaxe
description: A solidly built pickaxe, dependable and effective.

name: Pixter
description: A playful pickaxe, light but oddly effective in short bursts.

name: Robust Pickaxe+
description: An upgraded version of the robust pickaxe, reinforced and refined.

name: Nature's Pickaxe
description: A pickaxe intertwined with roots and vines, resonating with the earth's essence. Unbreakable but weak

name: Haunted Pickaxe
description: Whispers of trapped souls echo from its blade.

name: Pinkgem Axe
description: Forged with glowing pink gemstones, it radiates elegance and strength.

name: DRICK
description: Styvec's DRICK. Heavy and oddly shaped, but brutally efficient.

name: Hypickeon
description: A mysterious tool, its form seems unstable yet powerful.

name: Murderous Aura Pickaxe
description: A cursed pickaxe radiating a murderous aura. The ground itself recoils at its touch.

name: Enchanted Pickaxe
description: Runic symbols decorate the surface of this pick.

name: Mining Bun
description: Simple rations for the mine. Small boost.

name: Bun Pack
description: Longer lasting buns! Moderate boost.

name: Water
description: Drink some water and stay sharp.

name: Mine Beer
description: Brewed for miners. Greatly boosts morale and efficiency.

name: Adamantite Ore
description: The ultimate metal, harder than diamond and lighter than air.

name: Miner's Headlamp
description: A bright LED headlamp that illuminates dark mine tunnels.

name: Crystal Lens Goggles
description: Precision goggles with crystal lenses that reveal hidden ore veins.

name: Eagle Eye Visor
description: A legendary visor that grants the vision of an eagle, seeing through stone itself.

name: Oracle's Third Eye
description: A mystical artifact that grants supernatural vision, revealing all secrets.

name: Lucky Charm Necklace
description: A simple charm that brings a bit of good fortune.

name: Rabbit's Foot Keychain
description: A genuine rabbit's foot that significantly improves your luck.

name: Four-Leaf Clover Pin
description: A rare four-leaf clover preserved in amber, radiating fortune.

name: Fortune's Blessing Ring
description: A golden ring blessed by the goddess of fortune herself.

name: Probability Manipulator
description: A mysterious device that bends reality itself to your favor.

name: Swift Mining Boots
description: Lightweight boots that let you move quickly through mine tunnels.

name: Hermes' Sandals
description: Winged sandals that grant the speed of the messenger god.

name: Lightning Runner Gear
description: Electrified equipment that channels lightning energy into pure speed.

name: Time Dilation Device
description: A clockwork device that manipulates time around you, making you appear to move at impossible speeds.

name: Quantum Tunneling Kit
description: Experimental technology that allows you to phase through obstacles, achieving ultimate mining efficiency.

name: Energy Drink
description: A caffeinated boost that makes you move faster for a short time.

name: Luck Potion
description: A bubbling green potion that temporarily improves your fortune.

name: Vision Elixir
description: A crystal-clear elixir that sharpens your sight and reveals hidden details.

name: Miner's Multi-Tool
description: A versatile tool that provides balanced mining capabilities with enhanced efficiency.

name: Prospector's Dream Pickaxe
description: A legendary pickaxe that seems to know where the best ore is hidden.
